isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Service (1995 through 1999) - SECTION 12: HIGH PRESSURE LUBE OIL SYSTEM - SUPPLY MANIFOLD REMOVAL - REMOVING THE LUBE OIL SUPPLY HOSE

svcproc.title: REMOVING THE LUBE OIL SUPPLY HOSE

svcsubproc.title: Engines Equipped With Old Three-Way Fitting
Engines Equipped With New Three-Way Fitting

figure.caption: Figure 12.9 Removing Oil Supply Hose On Engines Equipped With The Old Three-Way Fitting
Figure 12.10 Removing Oil Supply Hose On Engines Equipped With The New Three-Way Fitting

svcsubproc.title: Engines Equipped With Engine Mounted ECM Unit

step1.para: Cap high pressure pump fittings and supply manifold fittings using high pressure oil cap set ZTSE4295.
